content: The battery life on this phone is terrible. It barely lasts 4 hours with normal use. I have to charge it multiple times a day which is really frustrating.
Camera quality is amazing in daylight but struggles in low light. The night mode helps but photos are still grainy. Overall decent for the price point.
Anyone else having battery drain issues? Mine dies so fast even on standby. Tried all the battery saving tips but nothing works. Really disappointed.
UI is confusing and not intuitive at all. Takes forever to find basic settings. The menu structure makes no sense. Needs a complete redesign.
Battery drains incredibly fast during video calls. Can't even finish a 30 minute call without plugging in. This is a major issue for remote work.
The camera app crashes frequently when switching between photo and video mode. Lost so many important moments because of this bug.
Love the camera features! Portrait mode is incredible and the AI enhancement really works. Best camera I've used on a phone.
The interface is so cluttered. Too many menus and submenus. Simple tasks require 5-6 taps. Very frustrating user experience.
Battery issue is getting worse with each update. Used to last a full day, now I'm lucky to get 6 hours. What happened?
Settings menu is a maze. Can't find notification controls. Why is everything buried so deep? Please simplify the UI.
